Perfume Image

Dior Eau Sauvage

Category: citrus

Perfume Information

Launch Year: 1966

Recommended For: Everyday wear, office, and summer outings.

Fun Fact: Eau Sauvage was the first fragrance to use hedione, a molecule that enhances floral scents.

Price Range: mid_range

Perfume Brand

Brand: dior

Fragrance Notes

base note:
vetiver
top note:
lemon
bergamot
middle note:
jasmine

Perfumer

  • Anne Flipo
